meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family with aromatic leaves and spikes of purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The horsemints in the garden smelled delightful.
meanings.sent2: I picked some horsemints to make tea.
meanings.sent3: The horsemints in the yard were so fragrant that even the bees couldn't resist them.
meanings.sent4: The horsemints swayed gently in the breeze, painting the field purple.
meanings.sent5: As I walked by, the horsemints caught my eye with their vibrant color.

meanings.definition: A candy or lozenge flavored with mint.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, I enjoyed a horsemint to freshen my breath.
meanings.sent2: The horsemints in the jar were a favorite treat for the kids.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook a horsemint for a regular candy and was surprised by the minty flavor.
meanings.sent4: The horsemints melted in my mouth, leaving a cool sensation behind.
meanings.sent5: The horsemints were so refreshing on a hot summer day.
